item.title: Report X-2023090691
item.description:
Report X-2023090691

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-26T18:14:26+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-11
  • City: SHREWSBURY
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: BATTERY FOUND TO BE UPSIDE INSIDE BOX, IT WAS DETERMINED THAT IT WAS A LEAD ACID BATTERY THAT LEAKED. THE CONTAINER AND ALL PACKING MATERIAL WERE DRENCHED IN SULFURIC ACID. ACID NEUTRALIZED AND SOLIDIFIED AND BAGGED WITH ALL REMAINING CARDBOARD

item.title: Report X-2023090757
item.description:
Report X-2023090757

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-28T15:12:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-31
  • City: LYNNFIELD
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: THE PACKAGE WAS UNLOADED, PALED AND SORTED TO THE NORTH SORT AISLE. THEN THE PACKAGE WAS SORTED INTO THE BOXLINE. THE PRELOADER NOTICE THE WAS LEAKING. HE LEFT THE AREA, SHUT DOWN THE BOXLINE STOPPING FORWARD PROGRESS AND NOTIFIED HIS SUPERVISOR. THE SUPERVISOR THEN CALLED FOR A DESIGNATED RESPONDER. THE RESPONDER, FOLLOWING THE DECISION TREE AND THE APPROPRIATE RESPONSE SHEET, PLACED THE LEAKING PACKAGE INTO A DMP LINED SPILL TUB. THE EQUIPMENT WAS DECONTAMINATED FOLLOWING THE DECONTAMINATION CHECKLIST. THE PACKAGE WAS THEN TRANSPORTED TO THE DMP AREA FOR FURTHER PROCESSING. IT WAS THERE THE PACKAGE WAS FOUND TO BE AN UNDECLARED.

Report X-2023090096

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: THE PACKAGE ARRIVED AT THE END OF THE RED BELT AND RESPONDER WAS CALLED FOR LEAKER. RESPONDER NOTED PACKAGE WAS A CLEARLY MARKED HAZMAT, FOLLOWED THE PROTOCOL FOR THE PPE AND CLEANUP, AND PROCESSED IN THE DMP.

item.title: Report I-2023090093
item.description:
Report I-2023090093

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-22T15:12:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-24
  • City: Auburn
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: ROSSI MOTOR FREIGHT, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: FORKLIFT OPERATOR WAS LOADING A WOODEN PALLET OF 32 HM JUGS AND CAUGHT/PUNCTURED- 1 OF 32 HM JUGS WITH HIS FORKLIFT FORKS. THE FORKLIFT OPERATOR BACKED OUT OF THE TRAILER AND NOTIFIED A SUPERVISOR TO WHAT HAD HAPPENED. THE FORKLIFT OPERATOR WAS DIRECTED AFTER REVIEW OF THE ERG BOOK TO CONTAIN THE SPILL USING EYE PROTECTION, GLOVES AND ABSORBANT MATERIAL, THEN PLACE THE CLEANUP MATERIAL AND DEBRIS INTO A CONTAINMENT DRUM FOR DISPOSAL TO NE DISPOSAL TECHNOLOGY.
